name: Cult, Chapter One
description:
Cult is a short, single player, first person horror game experience with an interactive storyline to keep you up for nights. A story of sacrifice only few could conquer.

CULT IS...
- An interactive story to keep you locked in to the spine-chilling gameplay.
- A game where you must constantly be on the look out for the different types of enemies, you can't fight... so running is your best friend.
- A game of stealth. Keep quiet, sneak past enemies and find what you cant leave without.
- Deceiving Find batteries and notes to make progress, just be careful who you trust.

Cult contains instances of strong language and gore.
